articles.description: ONGC rose 8.18% to a 52-week high of Rs 253 appiece, followed by Oil India that rose 4.4%. Reliance Industries surged 4.46% intraday to a record Rs 2,826.95 apiece.
articles.content: ONGC announced successful production at its deep-water KG-DWN-98/2 Block on Jan. 7. The company anticipates the block to produce 45,000 barrels of oil per day. With the commencement of production at … [+469 chars]

articles.title: AU Small Finance Bank shares fall nearly 12 percent after December quarter earnings - The Financial Express
articles.description: The stock plunged 11.72 per cent to Rs 625 on the BSE.At the NSE, it fell by 11.79 per cent to Rs 624.35.The Jaipur-based bank had earned a profit of Rs 393 crore in the same quarter of FY23.
articles.content: Shares of AU Small Finance Bank Ltd on Monday tumbled nearly 12 per cent after the company reported a 4 per cent decline in net profit at Rs 375 crore for the third quarter ended December 2023, mainl… [+808 chars]

articles.author: Aishwarya Nair
articles.title: BPCL profit rises on healthy Q3 refining margins, but misses estimates - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Analysts had anticipated net profit is around Rs 3,303.80 crore, down around 70 percent QoQ, with a YoY increase of about 30 percent.
articles.content: Bharat Petroleum Corp Ltd on Monday reported a consolidated net profit of Rs 3,181.42 crore for the third quarter ended December 31, 2023, against a profit of Rs 1,747.01 crore a year ago, helped by … [+1978 chars]

articles.title: SBI Card share price plunges over 5% as Q3 result misses estimates; should you buy, sell or hold the stock? | Mint - Mint
articles.description: SBI Cards and Payment Services, the State Bank of India-backed credit card services provider reported an 8% growth in its net profit to  ₹549 crore in the third quarter of FY24, from  ₹509 crore in the same period a year ago.
articles.content: SBI Card share price plunged over 5% in the early trade on Monday after the company reported Q3 results below expectations amid a sharp rise in credit cost. SBI Card shares fell as much as 5.89% to 7… [+4542 chars]
